txt.en: 'I hope to hold this farm long against the ills that befell Stangard when Sithric arrived. This place can be a haven to all who come here, and I will defend it with my own life.\n\n'I wish to see us well-supplied for the coming months, and I have been gathering ore and wood whenever I get a chance. Would you be willing to add some to our stores?'
'Hail, friend! Ah, this is a very good supply. I appreciate your great efforts on our behalf, as always.'
Gadda hopes to hold this farm long against such hunger and short supply as befell Stangard.
Wood and ore can be found in the plains surrounding the abandoned farm.\n\nYou should collect wood and ore for the farm's supply.
Gadda can be found at the abandoned farm.\n\nYou should bring the materials you gathered to Gadda for his supply.
